## Stable Attributes

### mcp.prompt.result

The content of the prompt result.

| Property | Value |
| --- | --- |
| Type | `string` |
| Has PII | maybe |
| Exists in OpenTelemetry | No |
| Example | `An example prompt result!` |

### mcp.tool.result.content

The content of the tool result.

| Property | Value |
| --- | --- |
| Type | `string` |
| Has PII | maybe |
| Exists in OpenTelemetry | No |
| Example | `{"output": "rainy", "toolCallId": "1"}` |
